missions.name: the_envoy
missions.title: The Envoy
missions.description: Chancellor Irene welcomes Prince Tybalt in Jade Oasis, and listens to his plea. Even though it seems that Warlord Grim is now in full controll, she still believes in a diplomatic solution. Irene sends her most renowned commander, Admiral Torsten, as an Envoy to Amber Fotress.

missions.name: delegation
missions.title: Delegation
missions.description: With Warlord Grim unwilling to let the Jade Twilight envoy through, Chancellor Irene orders a different approach. Admiral Torsten must establish a corridor, that will allow him to move forces towards Amber Fortress.

missions.name: exchange_arguments
missions.title: Exchange of arguments
missions.description: Jade Twilight expedition hits a roadblock when they encounter a defensive line prepared by Amber Noon. It didn't work out well for them so far. Do they have some other plan then?

missions.name: lost_in_translation
missions.title: Lost in translation
missions.description: Despite his recent successes, Admiral Torsten is forced to try and find an easier route towards Amber Fortress. On his way, he finds a Ruby Dusk stronghold standing in his path. Chancellor Irene hopes to negotiate with them a safe passage.
